full_transcript: Vorex is the core of K-Stream. By processing packets with millisecond latency, we ensure that your server fans don't have to ramp up for junk traffic. We keep your average rack temp at a steady 22 degrees even during a DDoS event. That is the Kyberon stability guarantee.

segments.text: Vorex is the core of K-Stream. It processes packets with millisecond latency at the edge.
segments.speaker: Sales Rep

segments.text: This ensures that your server fans don't have to ramp up for junk traffic. We maintain thermal stability.
segments.speaker: Sales Rep

segments.text: Even during a DDoS, your racks stay at 22 degrees. That is the Kyberon stability guarantee.
